hang up waiting for response ...

"2002-09-06 18:01:07 - Ctx(/coflusa) : IOException in R( /coflusa 
+ /outbound/consoleOrders.jsp + null) - java.net.SocketException: Connection 
reset by peer: socket write error
"
We are using tomcat in production from 3 month ago and now unexpectedly 
happens...

Thanks in advance....

Message generated if Oracle restarted and you try use not closed connection.
